title: [UX] Chat positioning - avoid empty lines before short chat
description: When chat is short, it appears near the bottom with empty lines above. Should appear right after header until chat fills screen. Needs proper design - current ScrollUp approach inherently positions content near bottom.

logs.msg: Design documented in ai/design/chat-positioning.md. Key insight: ScrollUp inherently positions content near bottom - need row-tracking for short chat mode. Previous attempts failed because they didn't handle the transition from shortâ†’full chat properly.
Attempted implementation twice, both caused regressions. Need proper row-tracking approach - see ai/design/chat-positioning.md. The issue is that ScrollUp inherently positions content near bottom.
Fixed via RenderState extraction + row-tracking mode. Commit bb36486 + a10d57f. Chat now positions at absolute rows until overflow, then transitions to scroll mode.
